translations: 传送，运输；表达，传递；<法律>转让（土地、财产等）

sentences.sentence: Euclid was trying to convey his idea of a geometrical point.
sentences.translation: 欧几里德正试图表达他的一个几何学观点。

sentences.sentence: I have tried to convey something of the flavour of the argument.
sentences.translation: 我试图表达某种类似论据的东西。

sentences.sentence: Try to understand what messages they convey.
sentences.translation: 尝试理解它们所传达的信息。
